content: In terms of our product road map guidance, we're on track for deliveries of additional versions of Lucid Air later this year, including the grand -- Air Grand tour performance, the Air Pure, the touring and for production of Project Gravity SUV in the first half of 2024. So I mean, I'm not really going to provide any guidance with respect to how much cash we want to the bank, but I just want you to know that you're going to continue to see from us the same type of proactive kind of opportunistic behavior that you've seen every quarter, we're coming to you, and we're telling you about something interesting that we've done in the capital markets, we did the convertible bond offering.
